mapper.select:
select
from PlantDevision where AnotherName like concat('%', #{anothername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')

select
from PlantDevision where FamilyName like concat('%', #{familyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')

select
from PlantDevision where Genusname like concat('%', #{genusname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')

select
from PlantDevision where SpeciesName like concat('%', #{speciesname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
from PlantDevision where GrowingEnvironment like concat('%', #{growingenvironment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')

SELECT pd.DevisionID, pd.FamilyName, pd.GenusName, pd.SpeciesName, pd.AnotherName, da.Province, da.City, da.Country, u.userName, pd.CreationTime, pd.UpdateTime, pd.GrowingEnvironment FROM PlantDevision pd LEFT JOIN DistributionArea da ON pd.DistributionAreaID = da.DistributionAreaID LEFT JOIN User u ON pd.Creator = u.userId where DevisionID = #{devisionid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT pd.DevisionID, pd.FamilyName, pd.GenusName, pd.SpeciesName, pd.AnotherName, da.Province, da.City, da.Country, u.userName, pd.CreationTime, pd.UpdateTime, pd.GrowingEnvironment FROM PlantDevision pd LEFT JOIN DistributionArea da ON pd.DistributionAreaID = da.DistributionAreaID LEFT JOIN User u ON pd.Creator = u.userId where FamilyName like concat('%', #{familyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')

SELECT pd.DevisionID, pd.FamilyName, pd.GenusName, pd.SpeciesName, pd.AnotherName, da.Province, da.City, da.Country, u.userName, pd.CreationTime, pd.UpdateTime, pd.GrowingEnvironment FROM PlantDevision pd LEFT JOIN DistributionArea da ON pd.DistributionAreaID = da.DistributionAreaID LEFT JOIN User u ON pd.Creator = u.userId where Genusname like concat('%', #{genusname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')

SELECT pd.DevisionID, pd.FamilyName, pd.GenusName, pd.SpeciesName, pd.AnotherName, da.Province, da.City, da.Country, u.userName, pd.CreationTime, pd.UpdateTime, pd.GrowingEnvironment FROM PlantDevision pd LEFT JOIN DistributionArea da ON pd.DistributionAreaID = da.DistributionAreaID LEFT JOIN User u ON pd.Creator = u.userId where SpeciesName like concat('%', #{speciesname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')

SELECT pd.DevisionID, pd.FamilyName, pd.GenusName, pd.SpeciesName, pd.AnotherName, da.Province, da.City, da.Country, u.userName, pd.CreationTime, pd.UpdateTime, pd.GrowingEnvironment FROM PlantDevision pd LEFT JOIN DistributionArea da ON pd.DistributionAreaID = da.DistributionAreaID LEFT JOIN User u ON pd.Creator = u.userId where AnotherName like concat('%', #{anothername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')

SELECT pd.DevisionID, pd.FamilyName, pd.GenusName, pd.SpeciesName, pd.AnotherName, da.Province, da.City, da.Country, u.userName, pd.CreationTime, pd.UpdateTime, pd.GrowingEnvironment FROM PlantDevision pd LEFT JOIN DistributionArea da ON pd.DistributionAreaID = da.DistributionAreaID LEFT JOIN User u ON pd.Creator = u.userId where Province like concat('%', #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')

SELECT pd.DevisionID, pd.FamilyName, pd.GenusName, pd.SpeciesName, pd.AnotherName, da.Province, da.City, da.Country, u.userName, pd.CreationTime, pd.UpdateTime, pd.GrowingEnvironment FROM PlantDevision pd LEFT JOIN DistributionArea da ON pd.DistributionAreaID = da.DistributionAreaID LEFT JOIN User u ON pd.Creator = u.userId where City like concat('%', #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')

SELECT pd.DevisionID, pd.FamilyName, pd.GenusName, pd.SpeciesName, pd.AnotherName, da.Province, da.City, da.Country, u.userName, pd.CreationTime, pd.UpdateTime, pd.GrowingEnvironment FROM PlantDevision pd LEFT JOIN DistributionArea da ON pd.DistributionAreaID = da.DistributionAreaID LEFT JOIN User u ON pd.Creator = u.userId where Country like concat('%', #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')

SELECT pd.DevisionID, pd.FamilyName, pd.GenusName, pd.SpeciesName, pd.AnotherName, da.Province, da.City, da.Country, u.userName, pd.CreationTime, pd.UpdateTime, pd.GrowingEnvironment FROM PlantDevision pd LEFT JOIN DistributionArea da ON pd.DistributionAreaID = da.DistributionAreaID LEFT JOIN User u ON pd.Creator = u.userId where GrowingEnvironment like concat('%', #{growingenvironment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')

SELECT pd.DevisionID, pd.FamilyName, pd.GenusName, pd.SpeciesName, pd.AnotherName, da.Province, da.City, da.Country, u.userName, pd.CreationTime, pd.UpdateTime, pd.GrowingEnvironment FROM PlantDevision pd LEFT JOIN DistributionArea da ON pd.DistributionAreaID = da.DistributionAreaID LEFT JOIN User u ON pd.Creator = u.userId;
mapper.insert:
insert into PlantDevision
DevisionID, FamilyName, GenusName, SpeciesName, AnotherName, DistributionAreaID, GrowingEnvironment, Creator, CreationTime, UpdateTime,
#{devisionid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{familyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{genusname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{speciesname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{anothername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{distributionareaid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{growingenvironment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
mapper.update:
update PlantDevision
FamilyName = #{familyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GenusName = #{genusname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SpeciesName = #{speciesname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AnotherName = #{anothername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DistributionAreaID = #{distributionareaid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GrowingEnvironment = #{growingenvironment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Creator = #{creator,jdbcType=INTEGER},
UpdateTime=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
where DevisionID = #{devisionid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update PlantDevision set FamilyName = #{familyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GenusName = #{genusname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SpeciesName = #{speciesname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AnotherName = #{anothername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DistributionAreaID = #{distributionareaid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, GrowingEnvironment = #{growingenvironment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Creator = #{creator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UpdateTime = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where DevisionID = #{devisionid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
